title: Legal advice
text1: There are various problems that foreigners face while living in Japan, such as status of residence, international marriage, divorce and employment. The Green Box can help you with any problems you may have (employment of foreigners, recruitment of foreign students and partners, visa procedures, language barriers, etc.) and can introduce you to specialists if necessary.
text2: There are a total of 29 different types of visas for coming to Japan and living in this country. Here, these visa types are also divided into different types.
